bio.p: Dr. Walter is currently an Assistant Visiting Professor of German and English at Emory University’s Oxford College, where he teaches German, English Composition, and Linguistics. His research interests include Second Language Acquisition, Second Language Case and Gender Learning, and Psycholinguistic and Emergent Approaches to Language Development.
